metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2141 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The InvertibleRWFunction::CalculateInverse function in rw.cpp in libcrypt++ 5.6.2 does not properly blind private key operations for the Rabin-Williams digital signature algorithm, which allows remote attackers to obtain private keys via a timing attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcrypto++-utils - 5.6.1-7
libcrypto++9v5 - 5.6.1-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6.1-7').
